com.epimorphics.lda.sources
Class LocalSource

java.lang.Object
  com.epimorphics.lda.sources.SourceBase
      com.epimorphics.lda.sources.LocalSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Source
public class LocalSource
extends SourceBase
implements Source

Data source which represents an in-memory model loaded from a local file. Used for testing. Model will be reloaded from file each time this class is constructed!

Version:
$Revision: $
Author:
Dave Reynolds
